short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Christmas Great Again by spreading Christmas joy to every corner of the internet covering the 2019 election. Vote Santa!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sick of the election and just want to get on with Christmas?

Make Christmas Great Again is a Google Chrome plugin which hijacks the 2019 UK election discussions on the web by spreading Christmas joy to every corner of the internet covering the upcoming Christmas nativity (election).

Install the plugin and allow our Make Christmas Great Again campaign save you from the misery of never ending political coverage by converting all mentions of the election to something a little more festive.

Santa will be pleased.

Any questions? Drop us a line at hello@lolly.co!
